Description.Details:
Medium Range Missiles are dead-fire missiles with the guidance systems removed, making the whole package smaller. The MRM-10 was designed to be easily swapped in for an SRM6. MRMs suffer a baseline innacuracy over other missile systems, but are more accurate than Dead-Fire modified LRMs.

Missile weapons have a negative accuracy modifier that is percentage based and applied after the standard To Hit chance is calculated. MRM weapons accuracy modifier is not affected by a Narc Missile Beacon, however will be negatively affected by Anti Missile Systems.
